explanation: [0-0] A man stands on a dirt road, his hands clenched into fists at his sides, head tilted back as he yells loudly. He wears a black shirt and blue jeans, his feet dusty and dirty in a pair of flip-flops. A wooden fence is visible behind him, lined with green trees and a small purple house.

[0-7] The man lets out a loud yell, and the camera cuts to three boys in flip-flops standing with their backs to the camera outside a small shop. The boy on the left wears a yellow t-shirt and red pants, the one in the middle wears a pink shirt and dark blue jeans with white blocks, and the boy on the right wears an all-black outfit. The shop window and roof display various items. Upon hearing the man's yell, they quickly turn their heads, revealing a woman in a colorful dress standing inside the shop. The camera cuts back to the yelling man, who remains in the same position, still yelling loudly.

[7-11] The shot changes to the three boys rushing around a corner, the dirt road continuing around the bend, surrounded by green trees. A person in white walks past in the background. The three boys reach the man and begin to comfort him.

[11-20] The scene cuts to a young boy standing on the dirt road with the man, holding something in his right hand as he smiles mischievously. He shakes his head and walks toward the camera. He wears a yellow t-shirt with dark stripes and blue shorts. The scene then shows the boy following behind the man, running up and poking him in the buttocks with his right hand before quickly running away. The man starts to return to his original posture, yelling loudly. The camera cuts back to the three boys jumping back from the man, looking at him in surprise as he pouts, his left hand continuously rubbing his behind and his right finger pointing at his sore bottom. The three boys continue to look at the man in surprise, scratching their heads with their right hands from time to time, expressing their confusion.
